Proxy_.index_4_: The hostname when the request is forwarded to the back-end server, usually $http_host, if the target URL is a domain name, you need to change it to a domain name
Proxy_.index_5_: Please enter a comment to be empty
Proxy_.index_6_: Target: you can fill in the site you need to proxy, the target if you choose the URL address must be a normal access to the URL, if you choose UNIX must be a socket file
Proxy_.index_7_: Send domain name: add the domain name to the request header to pass to the back-end server, the default is the target URL domain name, if not set properly may lead to the proxy can not be accessed properly, for example:
Proxy_.index_8_: http://192.168.100.20:19888, then just send the domain name keeping $http_host
Proxy_.index_9_: http://www.bt.cn, then the sending domain should be changed to www.bt.cn
Proxy_.index_10_: The above examples are only common cases, please refer to the actual situation

Proxy_.index_28_: Caching is a technology used to speed up website performance and improve user experience
Proxy_.index_29_: Resources will be cached when turned on, turn it off if it affects site access
Proxy_.index_30_: The cache key consists of a hostname, URI, and request parameters
Proxy_.index_31_: Response headers that are ignored by default are: Set-Cookie{'|'}Cache-Control{'|'}expires{'|'}X-Accel-Expires
Proxy_.index_33_: The cache of the site containing all URLs will be cleared after the cleanup, should I continue?
Proxy_.index_38_: Used to compress the content of HTTP responses to reduce the amount of data transferred and improve site performance and loading speeds
Proxy_.index_39_: Compression level 1-9, e.g. 1 is the fastest compression speed but lower compression rate; 9 is the slowest compression speed but highest compression rate, it is recommended to default to
Proxy_.index_40_: If gzip is turned on and it affects the normal access to the website, please turn off this feature and the request parameters

Cert_.Tips_: Tips: The site lacks SSL certificate, accessing may be risky.

CurrentTips_.0_: Paste you KEY and CRT content, and then save it.
CurrentTips_.1_: If the browser prompts that the certificate chain is incomplete, please check if the PEM certificate is correctly spliced correctly.
CurrentTips_.2_: PEM format certificate = domain name certificate .crt + root certificate (root_bundle).crt.
CurrentTips_.3_: When no SSL default site is specified, a site without SSL will use HTTPS to access the site with SSL enabled.
CurrentTips_.4_: If you cannot access HTTPS after enabling it, please check whether the security group has properly released port 443.

Cert_.SaveErrorMsg_: Please fill in the complete certificate content

SaveConfirm_.Content_: If the current certificate content changes, the certificate information will be updated. Continue?

ForceHttpsConfirm_.Content_: After disabling forced HTTPS, you need to clear the browser cache to see the effect. Would you like to proceed?

StatusConfirm_.Start_: About to turn on this site, are you sure to continue?
StatusConfirm_.Stop_: Unable to access when you turn off site, are you sure to continue?

LetFileTips_.0_: Please check domain resolution before applying, unresolved domain leads to audit failure.
LetFileTips_.1_: The certificate is valid for 3 months, supports wildcard domain. Auto-renew by default.
LetFileTips_.2_: If you uses CDN or redirect, you may not be able to apply and renew through file verification.
LetFileTips_.3_: When you do not specify a SSL default site, if you use HTTPS to access a site that does not have SSL enabled, you will directly access a site that has SSL enabled.

LetDnsTips_.0_: In DNS validation, we provide three automated DNS API, and provide manual mode.
LetDnsTips_.1_: The certificate can be renewed automatically by using the DNS API. In manual mode, the certificate needs to be reapplied after the certificate expires.
LetDnsTips_.2_: Before using the [aaPanel DNS Cloud Resolution] API, you need to confirm that the domain DNS for which you want to apply for SSL certificate is [Cloud Resolution].
LetDnsTips_.3_: Before using the [DNSPod/Ali Cloud DNS] API, you need to set the API key of the corresponding interface in the pop-up window.

DelHolder_.Content_: Are you sure to delete the certificate from the certificate holder?

Tips_.0_: After setting, you need to enter the password to access it.
Tips_.1_: For example, if I set the limit path /test/, then I need to enter the account password to access http://aaa.com/test/
Tips_.2_: Suffix: Indicates the suffix that is not allowed to access, if there are more than one, separate with

Tips_.2_: * Limit of single IP accessing max concurrency
Tips_.3_: * Limit the max traffic limit per request (unit: KB)

Tips_.1_: If the site cannot be accessed after the rewrite rules set, please try to reset to default.
Tips_.2_: You are able to modify rewrite rules, just save it after modification.

Tips_.0_: This is primary configuration file of the site.
Tips_.1_: Do not modify it at will if you do not know configuration rules.

Tips_.0_: Select the version according to your program requirements
Tips_.1_: Try not to use PHP5.2 unless you have to, as this can reduce your server security
Tips_.2_: PHP7 does not support the MySQL extension. The default installation is mysqli and mysql-pdo
Tips_.3_: [Customize] You can customize the PHP connection information by selecting the available PHP connection configuration
Tips_.5_: Support TCP or UNIX configuration. Example: 192.168.1.25:9001 or unix:/tmp/php8.sock
Tips_.6_: When enabled, session files will be stored in a separate folder, not in a common storage location with other sites
Tips_.7_: Do not enable this option if you are saving sessions to caches such as memcache/redis in your PHP configuration

Tips_.0_: Type: The domain name selected or the path entered will be redirected to the specified URL
Tips_.1_: Target URL: Fill in the URL address you need to redirect to
Tips_.2_: Mode: use 301 for permanent redirection and 302 for temporary redirection
Tips_.3_: Keep URI parameters: Whether the redirected URL has the sub-path or parameters of the source URL
Tips_.5_: NOT Keep URI parameters: http://b.com/1.html ---> http://a.com
Tips_.6_: This is the configuration file of the load balancing. Not modify if you do not understand the configuration rules.
Tips_.7_: After setting a domain redirect, the 404 redirect for that domain will be invalidated

Tips_.0_: Proxy dir: When accessing this dir, the content of the target URL will be displayed (Advanced Needs)
Tips_.1_: Target URL:Fill in the website you need to proxy, the target URL must be an accessible URL
Tips_.2_: Sent Domain: Add the domain name to the request header and pass it to the proxy server
Tips_.3_: Content replacement: Nginx exclusive, replace the content of the website with the specified content

Tips_.0_: By default, resources are allowed to be accessed directly,
Tips_.1_: i.e, requests with empty HTTP_REFERER are not restricted.
Tips_.2_: Multiple URL suffixes and domains should be separated by comma (,), such as png,jpeg,zip,js
Tips_.3_: When hotlink protection is triggered, the 404 status is returned directly

LogsConfig_.ScanContent_: It is recommended to perform security analysis when the server load is low. This time, the
LogsConfig_.ScanContent1_: file will be scanned. It may take a long time. Do you want to continue?

Tips_.0_: Log analysis: Scan the logs(/www/wwwroot/.log) for requests with attack (types include:
Tips_.2_: Analyzed log data contains intercepted requests
Tips_.3_: By default, the last scan data is displayed (if not, please click log scan)
Tips_.4_: If the log file is too large, scanning may take a long time, please be patient

DelSite_.ContentText1_: This will delete the selected website profile.

DelSite_.ContentText4_: Verify the information twice and delete sites in batches
DelSite_.ContentText7_: Please calm down for a few seconds and confirm the following data to be deleted.
DelSite_.ContentText8_: Note: This directory may contain important data. Exercise caution when performing this operation.
DelSite_.ContentText9_: Note: This site is created earlier and may contain important data. Exercise caution when performing this operation.
DelSite_.ContentText10_: Note: This database is large and may contain important data. Exercise caution when performing this operation.
DelSite_.ContentText11_: Note: This site is created earlier and may contain important data. Exercise	caution when performing this operation.
DelSite_.ContentText12_: Risks: The database recycle bin function is not enabled at present. After the database is	deleted, the database will disappear forever!
DelSite_.ContentText13_: Risk: The file recycle bin function is disabled at present. After a site directory is	deleted, the site directory will disappear forever!
DelSite_.ContentText14_: Please read the above information to be deleted carefully to prevent site data from being deleted by mistake. Confirm that there are still
DelSite_.ContentText15_: Note: please read the above information carefully to prevent site data from being deleted by mistake
